snippet: A ninth Monte Carlo Masters title is getting closer for Nadal with most of his rivals out of the way — including Roger Federer, who again misses out on one of the few trophies not already in his glittering collection....
lead_paragraph: A ninth Monte Carlo Masters title is getting closer for Nadal with most of his rivals out of the way — including Roger Federer, who again misses out on one of the few trophies not already in his glittering collection.

headline.print_headline: Nadal on Course for 9th Monte Carlo Title as Federer Exits
headline.main: Rafael Nadal on Course for His Ninth Monte Carlo Title as Federer Exits
